001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DurationSupport;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ExecuteModuleToolProvider;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ExecuteProcessToolProvider;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleLaunchingToolCall;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleSupport;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ProcessStartingToolCall;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolProviderSupport;
012import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolRunningToolCall;
013import com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow.WorkflowRunner;
014import java.io.PrintWriter;
015import java.io.StringWriter;
016import java.nio.file.Path;
017import java.time.Duration;
018import java.time.Instant;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024/** Java Shell Builder. */
025public class Bach implements AutoCloseable, Logbook.Trait {
026
027  public static void build(Project.Operator operator) {
028    var projectName = Configuration.computeDefaultProjectName();
029    var projectVersion = Configuration.computeDefaultProjectVersion();
030    var project = Project.of(projectName, projectVersion);
031    build(operator.apply(project));
032  }
033
034  public static void build(Project project) {
035    try (var bach = new Bach()) {
036      bach.logMessage("Build project %s".formatted(project.toNameAndVersion()));
037      var runner = new WorkflowRunner(bach, project);
038      runner.grabExternals();
039      runner.compileSpaces();
040      runner.executeTests();
041    }
042  }
043
044  /** {@return the version information compiled into Bach's module} */
045  public static String version() {
046    return ModuleSupport.version(Bach.class.getModule());
047  }
048
049  private final Configuration configuration;
050  private final Logbook logbook;
051
052  public Bach(String... args) {
053    this(Configuration.of().with(Options.parse(args)));
054  }
055
056  public Bach(Configuration configuration) {
057    this.configuration = configuration;
058    this.logbook = constructLogbook();
059    log(
060        configuration.verbose() ? System.Logger.Level.INFO : System.Logger.Level.DEBUG,
061        "Initialized Bach %s (Java %s, %s, %s)"
062            .formatted(
063                version(),
064                System.getProperty("java.version"),
065                System.getProperty("os.name"),
066                Path.of(System.getProperty("user.dir")).toUri()));
067  }
068
069  protected Logbook constructLogbook() {
070    return new Logbook(this);
071  }
072
073  public final Configuration configuration() {
074    return configuration;
075  }
076
077  public final Logbook logbook() {
078    return logbook;
079  }
080
081  public final Configuration.Pathing path() {
082    return configuration().pathing();
083  }
084
085  public final PrintWriter out() {
086    return configuration().printing().out();
087  }
088
089  public final PrintWriter err() {
090    return configuration().printing().err();
091  }
092
093  public Explorer explorer() {
094    return new Explorer(this);
095  }
096
097  public Grabber grabber(ExternalModuleLocator... locators) {
098    return grabber(ExternalModuleLocators.of(locators));
099  }
100
101  public Grabber grabber(ExternalModuleLocators locators) {
102    return new Grabber(this, locators);
103  }
104
105  public Printer printer() {
106    return new Printer(this);
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public void close() {
111    writeLogbook();
112    var duration = DurationSupport.toHumanReadableString(logbook().uptime());
113    logMessage("Total uptime was %s".formatted(duration));
114  }
115
116  public ToolRun run(String tool, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
117    return run(composer.apply(Command.of(tool)));
118  }
119
120  public ToolRun run(Command<?> command) {
121    return run(new ToolRunningToolCall(Optional.empty(), command));
122  }
123
124  public ToolRun run(ToolCall call) {
125    logbook().logToolCall(call);
126
127    if (call instanceof ToolRunningToolCall tool) {
128      var finder = tool.finder().orElse(configuration().tooling().finder());
129      var provider = finder.find(tool.name());
130      if (provider.isEmpty())
131        throw new RuntimeException("Tool '%s' not found".formatted(tool.name()));
132      return run(provider.get(), tool.arguments());
133    }
134    if (call instanceof ProcessStartingToolCall process) {
135      var tool = new ExecuteProcessToolProvider();
136      var command =
137          Stream.concat(Stream.of(process.executable().toString()), process.arguments().stream())
138              .toList();
139      return run(tool, command);
140    }
141    if (call instanceof ModuleLaunchingToolCall module) {
142      var tool = new ExecuteModuleToolProvider(module.finder());
143      var arguments = Stream.concat(Stream.of(module.name()), module.arguments().stream()).toList();
144      return run(tool, arguments);
145    }
146    throw new AssertionError("Where art thou, switch o' patterns?");
147  }
148
149  private ToolRun run(ToolProvider provider, List<String> arguments) {
150    var currentThread = Thread.currentThread();
151    var currentLoader = currentThread.getContextClassLoader();
152    currentThread.setContextClassLoader(provider.getClass().getClassLoader());
153
154    var out = new StringWriter();
155    var err = new StringWriter();
156    var start = Instant.now();
157    int code;
158    try {
159      var strings = arguments.toArray(String[]::new);
160      code = provider.run(new PrintWriter(out), new PrintWriter(err), strings);
161    } finally {
162      currentThread.setContextClassLoader(currentLoader);
163    }
164
165    var name = provider.name();
166    var duration = Duration.between(start, Instant.now());
167    var thread = currentThread.getId();
168    var output = out.toString().strip();
169    var errors = err.toString().strip();
170
171    var run = new ToolRun(name, arguments, thread, duration, code, output, errors);
172    var description = ToolProviderSupport.describe(provider);
173    logbook().logToolRun(run, description);
174
175    return configuration().lenient() ? run : run.requireSuccessful();
176  }
177
178  public void writeLogbook() {
179    try {
180      var file = logbook().write(path().workspace());
181      logCaption("Wrote logbook to %s".formatted(file.toUri()));
182    } catch (Exception exception) {
183      exception.printStackTrace(err());
184    }
185  }
186}
